named-query.name: UC_READ_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_TYPE_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContentType FROM com.ultracommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContentType structuredContentType WHERE structuredContentType.name = :name

named-query.name: UC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE_AND_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT structuredContent FROM com.ultracommerce.cms.structure.domain.StructuredContent structuredContent WHERE structuredContent.structuredContentType = :contentType AND (structuredContent.locale = :fullLocale OR structuredContent.locale = :languageOnlyLocale ) AND structuredContent.contentName = :contentName AND structuredContent.offlineFlag = false ORDER BY structuredContent.priority

named-query.name: UC_ACTIVE_STRUCTURED_CONTENT_BY_TYPE
